events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The system identified the issue as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery as reported by the customer.
Assigning the case to the refunds specialist team to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Thanks for responding. My order number is 987654, and I’ve attached a photo showing the item I received is different from what was advertised.
We have reviewed your case and will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate the quick solution and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund has been initiated successfully. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to help us improve our services. Your feedback is highly appreciated.
